definition: an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany
pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]

sentences.english: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.chinese: 據我估計我們離梅卡巴堡有七八公里遠。

sentences.english: I met some of these patriotic Americans at Fort Campbell.
sentences.chinese: 我在坎貝爾堡見到了這些愛國的美國志士。

sentences.english: Gaobei subtle hydrocarbon reservoir is situated in northern flank of Gaoshangpu buried hill of Nanpu depression.
sentences.chinese: 高北隱蔽油氣藏位於南堡凹陷高尚堡潛山北翼。

sentences.english: Has Chateau Pichon Baron been affected by the global financial crisis recently?
sentences.chinese: 全球性的金融海嘯對於碧尚男爵堡有何影響？

sentences.english: Much of Greensburg, Kansas has been leveled by a tornado.
sentences.chinese: 差不多整個堪薩斯州的格林斯堡都被龍捲風推平了。

sentences.english: Zoram'gar Outpost will be a Warsong Hold style base.
sentences.chinese: 佐拉姆加前哨站將會變爲一座戰歌堡風格的要塞。
是一款精緻優雅的白馬堡。

sentences.english: The angry Stuyvesant went to Fort Amsterdam and prepared to open fire on the British.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒的司徒維桑特走到阿姆斯特丹堡準備向英方開火。

sentences.english: The building in the background is the Army War College at Fort McNair.
sentences.chinese: 建設中的背景是美國陸軍戰爭學院麥克奈爾堡。

sentences.english: In former times the British army kept lots of soldiers at Fort William in Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 從前英國軍隊在蘇格蘭的威廉堡駐紮了很多士兵。

sentences.english: Over the weekend I’ve been in Fort Lauderdale as part of a performing arts seminar.
sentences.chinese: 整個週末，我都在羅德岱堡參加一個表演藝術研討會。

sentences.english: College of William and Mary , Williamsburg, VA.
sentences.chinese: 威廉和瑪麗學院，威廉斯堡，弗吉尼亞州。

sentences.english: Can you explain to us about Williamsburg in detail?
sentences.chinese: 你能給我們詳細講講威廉斯堡嗎？

sentences.english: This is the famed ancient Xiangxi Castle.
sentences.chinese: 這就是香溪堡非常有名的古堡。

sentences.english: A town of southern Pennsylvania east-southeast of Chambersburg.
sentences.chinese: 賓夕法尼亞南部錢伯斯堡東南偏東的一城鎮。

sentences.english: A 2 time ranking event semi-finalist, making his third appearance here at the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 兩次排名賽的半決賽，第三次在克魯斯堡亮相。

definition: Tucheng city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
